dct_title_s: Plan de New-York et des environs
dct_description_sm: Topographical map of New York City; relief shown by hachures; depths shown by soundings. Table of references identifies primary buildings and points of interest in the city. Includes inset: Port de New-York (scale [ca. 1:140,000]).
dct_publisher_sm: A Paris : Chez le Rouge, rue des Grands Augustins, 1777.
dct_subject_sm: New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—Maps—Early works to 1800
